terms.name: Jitendex
terms.description: A free and openly licensed Japanese-to-English dictionary with example sentences, usage notes, etymology notes, cross references, antonyms, definition notes.

kanji.name: KANJIDIC
kanji.description: An English dictionary with readings, meanings, stroke order diagrams, frequency, grade level, JLPT level and frequency of kanji characters.

frequency.name: BCCWJ
frequency.description: Based on the Balanced Corpus of Contemporary Written Japanese covering books, magazines, newspapers, blogs, forums, textbooks, and legal documents among others.
